description:
A beautiful and tall girl, follower of Yukimura. Being a master of the spear, she`s nicknamed "Matabei of the Spear".
She swings a long spear bigger than her own height in a splendid fighting performance, but she`s usually a silent person and doesn`t start conversations.
For some reason, she seems to have a special disposition.
name: Gotou Matabee
